prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon that has a leafy back and big, bright eyes.
Imagine a small, cute creature with a bulb on its back, perfect for beginner trainers.
Design a Pokemon with a friendly demeanor, primarily green with some lighter shades.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats, resembling a small dinosaur with plants.
Make a bipedal creature with a round body, showcasing shades of green and red.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of nature with its unique features.
Give me a Pokemon that can evolve into something bigger and more powerful.
